@EMA_News No Documents related to the PSUR-WSP DE/H/PSUR/0022/001 for #Lariam® (#Mefloquine) on the #EMA Website? After all discussions....
@EMA_News When will the #EMA publish the PAR for #Lariam® (#Mefloquine) from the #PSUR-#WSP DE/H/PSUR/0022/001 from 2009?
@EMA_News No PAR for #Lariam® (#Mefloquine) available? But there was a Ammended #PAR circulating in the #PSUR-WSP DE/H/PSUR/0022/001 in 2009
@EMA_News No "#Referral #Procedure" for Lariam® (#Mefloquine) during the #PSUR-#WSP DE/H/PSUR/0022/001? Strange... referring to the #BPG
@EMA_News From #DLP for #PSUR-WSP #DE/H/PSUR/0022/001 in 2009 it took 4 Years for the #FAR/#CSP in 2013. This doesnt follow the #BPG
@EMA_News No PAR for #Lariam® (#Mefloquine) available? But there was a Ammended #PAR circulating in the #PSUR-WSP DE/H/PSUR/0022/001
